plot: Addresses the social injustices that took place during and after the hurricane Katrina disaster through the lens of poet and activist Walidah Imarisha.
title: Finding Common Ground in New Orleans
plot_es: Addresses the social injustices that took place during and after the hurricane Katrina disaster through the lens of poet and activist Walidah Imarisha.
original_name: Finding Common Ground in New Orleans
plot_en: Addresses the social injustices that took place during and after the hurricane Katrina disaster through the lens of poet and activist Walidah Imarisha.
